abstract.t: These are the requirements for the "Video Optimization" use-case for the SADCDN topic, which broadly speaking seeks to optimize video playback experience in mobile networks by cooperative communication between video content providers and the providers of network services to end users. Discussion Venues This note is to be removed before publishing as an RFC. Source for this draft and an issue tracker can be found at https://github.com/mjoras/sadcdn-video-optimization-requirements.
